translations: （使）团聚，（使）重聚；（使）再结合，（使）重新团结

sentences.sentence: In addition, family reunions frequently attract blood relatives from faraway places who spend considerable money and time to reunite.
sentences.translation: 此外，家庭团聚经常会吸引远方来的血亲，他们会花费大量的金钱和时间来团聚。

sentences.sentence: His first job will be to reunite the army.
sentences.translation: 他的第一项任务将是重新统一军队。

sentences.sentence: There have been rumours that the band will reunite for a world tour.
sentences.translation: 有传言说这个乐队将复合作一次环球巡演。
